textBeforeTable: Sheets Gaskets Tape/cord Sheets After the embargo on asbestos, PTFE products have been widely used as a replacement. This Is especially true in the chemical industry due to their excellent durability, but also in the food industry as they are FDA approved. ERIKS has been using Gylon® (Garlock) and Gore® products for many years. PTFE Technical Request Form Insulation Materials RX® Protek Flange protection Flange products Manhole gaskets Flange insulation sets Semi-metallic corrugated Flange Gaskets Metallic rings Spiral Wound Gaskets MRG gaskets Camprofile gaskets Ring type joints Metallic and semi-metallic gaskets Mica PTFE Graphite Fibre Rubber
textAfterTable: GYLON 3545  Pure PTFE with a highly compressible outer layer  of microcellular PTFE and a rigid PTFE core. Designed for bad flange surfaces and low bolt loads. Has a high rigidity witch makes installation easier.   GORE GR "Made from 100% expanded PTFE. Because it is dimensionally stable, yet conformable, it is ideal for real world flange conditions. It conforms to rough surfaces, yet compresses into a very tough gasket that makes a tight, long lasting seal. GORE-TEX GR® sheet gasketing is ideal for sealing steel  flanges for many aggressive chemicals."   GORE GR-R Same as GOR GR with a rigid core made from pre-compressed expanded PTFE.  Provides 6 times more rigidity. Tape / cord Section  Type Description GORE DF "Mono-directional expanded PTFE tape equipped with a self-adhesive tape a one side. Very low surface pressure needed. Can absorb big flange distortions."
